title: ProX
description: ProX is a sleek and intuitive to-do list app developed with Flutter in summer 2023. It offers cross-platform compatibility, customizable task categories, reminders, and collaborative tools to help users efficiently manage their tasks on both Android and iOS devices.

title: Powerhouse
description: Powerhouse, my capstone project for my graduation degree, is a comprehensive gym management platform that enables users to book classes, reserve equipment, communicate with coaches, and track their activities.
